title: People crying op about stupid things still, when Zhonay's ring once existed.

embed.description: Zhonya's Ring was an advanced item in League of Legends. It was broken up into two different items, Zhonya's Hourglass and Rabadon's Deathcap, in V1.0.0.108. Zhonya's Hourglass was given the 2.5 second invulnerability active (defensive aspect), while Rabadon's Deathcap was given the ability power passive (offensive).

body: You kids think mages are broken now? Think again.
